title: tfgan.gan_train_ops is incompatible with DistibutionStrategy
body_html:
System information

  • Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): Yes.
  • OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Ubuntu 18.04
  • Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: N/A
  • TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary
  • TensorFlow version (use command below): 1.10
  • Python version: 2.7
  • Bazel version (if compiling from source): N/A
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 7.0
  • GPU model and memory: GTX 980M(4G memory)
  • Exact command to reproduce: N/A

Describe the problem

tfgan.gan_train_ops is incompatible with DistibutionStrategy.

tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/gan/python/train.py

Line 972 in e747550

global_step_inc = global_step.assign_add(1)
will cause "You must specify an aggregation method to update a MirroredVariable in Tower Context." error.

Describe the problem
tfgan.gan_train_ops is incompatible with DistibutionStrategy.

 will cause "You must specify an aggregation method to update a MirroredVariable in Tower Context." error.
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow)**: Yes.
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Ubuntu 18.04
- **Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device**: N/A
- **TensorFlow installed from (source or binary)**: binary
- **TensorFlow version (use command below)**: 1.10
- **Python version**: 2.7
- **Bazel version (if compiling from source)**: N/A
- **CUDA/cuDNN version**: 7.0
- **GPU model and memory**: GTX 980M(4G memory)
- **Exact command to reproduce**: N/A

### Describe the problem
tfgan.gan_train_ops is incompatible with DistibutionStrategy.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e7475504094b3018973740df470d2c9ee73a4fd5/tensorflow/contrib/gan/python/train.py#L972 will cause "You must specify an aggregation method to update a MirroredVariable in Tower Context." error.
